title: Washington Institute
description: Welcome to the Washington Institute Serving Washington DC, Maryland, and Virginia About Us For Appointments PRIMARY WELLNESS CENTER Washington Institute Of Natural Medicine 3701 Connecticut Ave., N.W. #1, Washington, D.C. 20008Located Within the Wilshire Condo Building Additional Wellness CentersMaryland Locations In Silver Spring, Bethesda, Olney, Frederick, Bowie, Baltimore, Catonsville, Greenbelt, Gaithersburg, Kensington, and Sandy Spring.Virginia...
cleaned_text: About Us Who Are We ? The Washington Institute of Natural Medicine is a natural health care center offering alternative medicine to the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area. The center's staff includes Doctors of Natural Health, Doctor of Naturopathy, Doctors of Integrative Homeopathy, Reiki practitioners, Lympathic Drainage practitioners, Alternative Medicine Nurses, certified and licensed practitioners, and natural health care interns.
